front.title: The Trust Anchor Key Renewal Method Applied to DNS Security (TAKREM-DNSSEC)

abstract.t: This document provides an authentication scheme based on thegeneric SDDA-RR mechanism (SEP DNSKEY Direct Authenticator DNSResource Record). The result is an automated key rollover mechanismfor trust anchor keys. This represents additional security protocolelements to the DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) in the area of keymanagement support functions for the DNS root zone and islands oftrust.
